text: Ruth Bell Graham (June 10, 1920 â€“ June 14, 2007) was the wife of evangelist Billy Graham. She was born at Qingjiang, Kiangsu, China as Ruth McCue Bell, the second of five children. Her parents, Dr. and Mrs. L. Nelson Bell, were medical missionaries at the Presbyterian Hospital 300 miles north of Shanghai. == Related pages == *List of poets from North America ==Other websites== *Official website on BillyGraham.org Category:1920 births Category:2007 deaths Category:American painters Category:American philanthropists Category:American poets Category:American Presbyterians Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Writers from North Carolina
title: Ruth Graham
